Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Homan/Arthington
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Polk, Kedzie, Roosevelt and Homan due to, street blockage near Homan/Arthington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Homan, Polk, Kedzie, Roosevelt, Homan and over the regular route, due to street blockage near Homan/Arthington.

Allow extra travel time.
